name: Paragliding One Day Course
description: In the course of a day, you can fly a paraglider on your own: Conduct several flights on your own, you will learn the basic theory about paragliding and you will be ready to continue a full course if you wish. We can do the course in the morning or afternoon; we can pick you up from your home or hotel and then take you to Cucuya, Lurin sand dunes located 40 minutes from Lima.
